game.title: The Lost Temple of the Moon Goddess
game.objective: Retrieve the ancient Moon Crystal and return it to the Temple Priestess
game.description: The Moon Goddess's temple has been desecrated by dark forces. The only way to restore balance is to retrieve her sacred crystal.

tasks.objective: Speak with the elderly Oracle in the nearby village.
tasks.description: Gather information from the Oracle about the temple's current state and any potential threats.

tasks.objective: Explore the abandoned mine near the temple for hidden passages.
tasks.description: Use your wits to navigate the treacherous tunnels and uncover a secret entrance to the temple.
tasks.location: Abandoned Mine, Temple of the Moon Goddess

tasks.objective: Defeat the dark cult leader within the temple's central chamber.
tasks.description: Face your fears and overcome the cult leader's minions to reach the Moon Crystal.
tasks.location: Central Chamber, Temple of the Moon Goddess
